description:
Stephanie`s Mudkip was the Pokemon she chose as her starter Pokemon. Stephanie`s father brought her to the local Pokemon Center where Nurse Joy had 3 starter Pokemon ready for her to choose from.
The starter Torchic that Nurse Joy had ready for Stephanie to pick from escaped from Max and Ash and evolved into a Combusken.
With the evolved Torchic not available as a starter Pokemon for her to choose from, she chose Mudkip without hesitation anyhow.
name: Mudkip (Stephanie)
